title: Curried Carrot Soup Submitted By: Vitamix
directions: Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure lid.
Turn machine on and slowly increase speed to Variable 10, then to High.
Blend for 6 minutes or until steam escapes through lid. Serve immediately.
For recipe variation, use 2%, skim or low fat milk instead of soy milk.

This recipe has been written for the C-Series machines with Variable Speed control and Standard 64-ounce container. If you are using a different Vitamix machine or container size, you may need to make adjustments to the Variable Speed, processing time, and/or in
ingredients: 6 (366 g) medium carrots, cut in large pieces
